benefits.headline: Eliminate payroll leakage and time fraud
benefits.description: Stops unauthorized payments caused by 'buddy punching,' ghost employees, and manual errors through biometric authentication and real-time cross-referencing, directly recovering lost revenue.
proof_points: Time fraud can cost up to 5% of gross payroll
Reduce time tracking errors by 30% on average
Prevents payment for unworked time (e.g., 10 mins late daily = 1 week paid/year)
benefits.business_impact: Direct reduction in gross payroll costs and prevention of financial loss due to fraud.

benefits.headline: Gain total visibility over distributed and mobile teams
benefits.description: Provides a single, real-time view of workforce productivity across 1,000+ locations, enabling management of remote, field, and on-premise employees regardless of where they work.
proof_points: Tracks full-time, part-time, contract, gig, and contingent employees
benefits.business_impact: Optimized resource allocation and improved accountability for remote/field staff.

benefits.headline: Automate complex scheduling and reduce administrative burden
benefits.description: Replaces time-consuming manual rostering with automated, demand-based scheduling that handles complex shift rotations, availability, and skills matching, freeing up managers for higher-value tasks.
proof_points: Clients rated ADP SecurTime 4 out of 5 stars
benefits.business_impact: Increased operational efficiency and reduced HR administrative overhead.

benefits.headline: Ensure regulatory compliance and mitigate legal risk
benefits.description: Automatically applies labor laws, overtime rules, and leave policies specific to individual locations and business types, ensuring audit readiness and preventing non-compliance penalties.
proof_points: Helps adhere to labour laws and regulations
Managers only approve time, not calculate hours/rules
benefits.business_impact: Avoidance of costly legal penalties and labor disputes.

benefits.headline: Streamline payroll processing with accurate, real-time data
benefits.description: Eliminates manual data entry and calculation errors by integrating attendance data directly with payroll systems, ensuring employees are paid accurately and on time.
supporting_features: Seamless conversion of work time to paychecks
benefits.business_impact: Faster payroll cycles and reduced employee grievances regarding pay.

benefits.headline: Enhance workplace safety with contactless technology
benefits.description: Supports health and safety protocols through touchless biometric options and health screening features, ensuring a hygienic environment for on-premise staff.
benefits.business_impact: Improved business continuity and employee well-being.

benefits.headline: Scale operations cost-effectively without infrastructure overhaul
benefits.description: Allows businesses to expand workforce management capabilities using cloud technology and existing devices (BYOD) or integrations, avoiding heavy upfront capital expenditures.
proof_points: Get on-cloud without additional investments to infrastructure
Avoid huge capex for small delivery centers
benefits.business_impact: Lower Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) and high scalability.
